alert.note: Alert for Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 2:15AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Patchy Fog Developing Around the Monterey Peninsula... Patchy dense fog has developed early this morning around Monterey. Visibilities are reduced to around one half mile in general, with localized areas experiencing visibilities of one quarter of a mile or less. Patchy fog should persist through the morning hours. Motorists are advised to drive with caution this morning as visibilities may widely vary over short distances. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the road when encountering significant reductions in visibility. Allow extra time to travel to destinations.

area.areaDesc: Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
